function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overrepresentation of students from socio-economically disadvantaged backgrounds","Impact":"Lack of a sound study environment at home and necessary digital infrastructure for remote education","Mitigation":"Policy responses such as provision of computers to disadvantaged students","Technologies":"Digital infrastructure and remote learning tools","People":"Students from socio-economically disadvantaged backgrounds","Owner":"Education policymakers and government"},{"Description":"Language barriers and difficulties of foreign-born parents in guiding children through host-country curricula","Impact":"Additional challenges in distance learning in the host-country language","Mitigation":"Language support programs for students and parents, cultural competence training for educators","Technologies":"Language learning apps and translation tools","People":"Foreign-born parents and their children","Owner":"School administrators and language educators"},{"Description":"Lack of data on educational attainment of children of immigrants during the crisis","Impact":"Limited understanding of the impact of the crisis on immigrant children's education","Mitigation":"Collecting and analyzing data on educational attainment, conducting surveys and assessments","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, survey software","People":"Researchers, educators, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions and government"}]}
